頯字的基本解释

頯
kuí
颧骨。
质朴：“其容寂，其颡頯。”

頯字的汉语字典释义

[①]［kuí］
［《廣韻》渠追切，平脂，羣。］
［《廣韻》居洧切，上旨，見。］
(1)颧骨。
(2)引申为高亢显露。

頯字的康熙字典解释

【戌集下】【頁字部】　頯； 康熙笔画：16； 页码：页1404第23
【五音集韻】苦對切，音塊。【莊子·大宗師】其容寂其顙頯。【註】頯，大朴貌，苦對反。向本作䫥。　又【集韻】苦軌切，音巋。義同。　又【莊子·天道篇】而顙頯然。【註】高露發美之貌。又【廣韻】居洧切【集韻】矩鮪切，?音晷。【廣韻】小頭。【爾雅·釋魚】貝蚆，博而頯。【註】頯者，中央廣兩頭銳。　又【集韻】苦委切【韻會】犬蕊切，?音垝。義同。　又【集韻】面頯也。一曰厚也。　又【唐韻】渠追切【集韻】【韻會】渠龜切【正韻】渠爲切，?音逵。【說文】權也。【集韻】頰骨。一曰厚也。或作頄。　又地名。【左傳·哀十六年】王孫燕奔頯黃氏。【註】頯黃，吳地。頯，求龜反。　又【集韻】渠尤切，音求。亦頰骨也。同頄。　【正字通】从月。月，肉也。俗从夕，非。

頯字的源字形

字源演变：

小篆楷体

字形对比：

中国大陆宋体台湾细明体香港明体日本明朝体韩国明朝体旧字形
頯字的起名意思

暂无。

Basic explanation of words
protrude
kuí
Cheekbones.
Simplicity: "Its loneliness, its 颡頯."
protrude
Chinese dictionary definition of words
[①] [kuí]
["Guangyun" Qu chase cut, Pingzhi, group. ]
["Guangyun" is very close, the decrement, see you. ]
(1) Cheekbones.
(2) The extension is high-pitched exposure.
protrude
Kangxi dictionary interpretation of words
【戌集下】【Page Department】　頯; Kangxi Strokes: 16; Page Number: Page 1404 Page 23
[Pentagram rhyme] bitter cut, sound block. 【Zhuangzi·Grand Master】Its capacity is quiet and its 颡頯. [Note] Tan, big and simple appearance, bitter opposition. To this for lingering.　[Jiyun] The bitter track is cut, the sound is 岿. The same meaning.　[Zhuangzi·Tiandao Chapter] and it's 颡ran. [Note] Gao Lufa has a beautiful appearance. And [Guang Yun] Ju Wei cut [Ji Yun] Rectangle cut,? Sound dial. [Guang Yun] Small head. [Erya·Shiyu] Shellfish, Bo and Dan. [Note] The central and broad sides are sharp at both ends.　[Ji Yun] Hard to cut [Rhyme] Kunrui cut,? Yin 垝. The same meaning.　[Jiyun] Noodles also. One is thick.　[Tang Yun] Qu chase cut [Ji Yun] [Yun Hui] Qu turtle cut [Zheng Yun] Qu is cut,? Yin Kui. [Said the text] Right also. [Jiyun] Cheek bones. One is thick. Or as 頄.　Also place name. [Zuo Zhuan·Sixteen Years of Amour] Wang Sunyan went to Tanhuang's clan. [Note] Tan Huang, Wu Di. Tan, beg the tortoise.　[Jiyun] Qu Youqie, the sound is seeking. Also cheekbones. Same as 頄.　【Zhengzitong】From the month. Month, meat also. Vulgar from the evening, non.

kuí, kuǐ
I сущ.
скула
II прил./наречие kuí
скулообразный, выпуклый, выступающий
其颡頯 у него выпуклый лоб
kuí, kuǐ
высокий и прекрасный (благородный)
